text: Egha akɨnafarir me Susan nguibar ekiamɨn osirigha provinsba bar dar amadaziba, Mordekai dar mam inigha Hatak ganɨngi. Akɨnafarir kam Judan gumazamizibagh asɨghasɨghamin mɨgɨrɨgɨaba an iti. Egha Mordekai a mɨgɨa ghaze, akɨnafarimɨn mɨngarim Esta gegharagh a mɨkemegh. Hatak Esta mɨkemeghtɨ a mangɨ uan gumazamiziba bagh atrivim gaghonɨva kamaghɨn an azaragham, a Estan adarazir apangkuvightɨ me ovengan kogham.
